example_sentence_italian: Ho parcheggiato la macchina in cortile.
example_sentence_english: I parked the car in the yard.

example_sentence_italian: Le macchine sono ferme nel traffico.
example_sentence_english: The cars are stuck in traffic.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visto delle macchine nel cortile.
example_sentence_english: I saw some cars in the yard.

example_sentence_italian: Il colore della macchina è brillante.
Ho legato il cane alla macchina.
example_sentence_english: I tied the dog to the car.
Bring the luggage to the cars.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso un libro dalla macchina.
example_sentence_english: I took a book from the car.
Noises were coming from the cars.
There is a bag in the car.
You will find documents in the cars.

example_sentence_italian: Ho messo una coperta sulla macchina.
example_sentence_english: I put a blanket on the car.
I placed stickers on the cars.

example_sentence_italian: Vado al lavoro con la macchina.
example_sentence_english: I go to work by car.

example_sentence_italian: Con le macchine moderne il consumo è minore.
example_sentence_english: With modern cars, consumption is lower.

notes: contraction of con + il; not used with feminine nouns; ungrammatical with 'macchina'
example_sentence_italian: Col macchina non è corretto; si dice con la macchina.
example_sentence_english: 'Col macchina' is not correct; you say 'con la macchina'.

notes: contraction of con + i; not used with feminine nouns; ungrammatical with 'macchine'
example_sentence_italian: Coi macchine non è corretto; si dice con le macchine.
example_sentence_english: 'Coi macchine' is not correct; you say 'con le macchine'.
